reviewText: Country Line Dancing has never been more popular! From coast to coast, folks are getting out on the dance floor and doing the "Slappin' Leather", and the "Honky Tonk Stomp" and many other popular dances.  Now you can learn these Dances at home...The "Slapping Leather", the "Honky Tonk Stomp", the "Cowboy Motion", and "Walking Wazi", and the "Country Strut"  Professional instructor Judi McDonald demonstrates each step in an easy to follow style, and then runs through the complete dance to music.
